category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_convert_backward_path_representation
preference.preference_description: Indicates if a checkbox option to convert backward branching paths will be displayed when a Process template is taken offline. Valid Values: * false: the checkbox option is not displayed when a Process template is taken offline. This is the default value. * true: the checkbox option is displayed when a Process template is taken offline and backward branching paths are present.
